source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a quiet residential street in Japan on a sunny day. The camera focuses on a traditional building with a distinctive wall of dark tiles and wood. The view then slowly pans to the left, revealing more of the narrow street and surrounding houses.
